messages.subject: Re:KidPix was more on art supplies!
messages.msgSnippet: Also, isn t KidPix strictly a Macintosh program?  We got lots of mileage out of if for years and years, but I don t know that it s available for Windows. Oops,
messages.messageBody:
Also, isn't KidPix strictly a Macintosh program? We got lots of mileage out
of if for years and years, but I don't know that it's available for Windows.

Oops, I just did a search for it on google, and found that it *is* now
available for Windows. Lucky people! The slide show function is a blast.

Jocelyn
--
Jocelyn Vilter
JVilter@...
http://www.nhen.org

>
>
> << Does Kid Pix have some advantage over the Paint program that comes with
> MS Windows? >>
>
> Designed for kids.
> "Rubber stamps" that they can change and create.
> CUTE erasers and "clear screen" patterns.
>
> Sandra
